DOC.detailed_description: A need exist find fast yet effective treatment protocol large number US military service personnel come back Iraq post traumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) , variety co-occurring psychological problem . This study examine effect six session EFT coach veteran population . The sample recruit client practitioner coach veteran . Participants assess PTSD psychological condition anxiety depression . Evaluations make use well-validated instrument , SA-45 ( Symptom Assessment 45 ) PCL-M ( Posttraumatic Stress Disorder Checklist - Military ) . Those meet military 's criterion PTSD-positive assessment PCL-M randomize two group . A wait list control group continue receive Standard Care ( SOC ) current healthcare provider . The experimental group receive SOC plus EFT coaching . A baseline measurement obtain approximately thirty day advance coaching , subject apply participate study , immediately coach begin . Participants assess three session six session , determine symptom change milestone . Followup assessment occur three month six month post-coaching . Pain level , alcohol use , recreational drug use , prescription drug dosage also track , order determine correlation participant characteristic psychological symptom change . Data also analyze determine outcome difference participant receive EFT life coach , whose EFT coaching deliver licensed psychologist social worker .
